title.value: Pragmatic Trials for Dementia Care in Long-term Services and Support Settings R61/R33

body.value:
Funding Opportunity Number: PAR-18-585 CFDA Number: 93.866

National Institute on Aging (NIA) invites applications for pragmatic trials for dementia care in Long-term Services and Support (LTSS) settings which will: (1) be designed to address practical comparative questions faced by Alzheimer’s disease (AD) and AD-related dementia (ADRD) patients, clinicians and caregivers (both paid and unpaid); (2) include broad and diverse populations; and (3) be conducted in real-world settings. These trials are intended to produce results that can be directly adopted by healthcare providers, patients or caregivers for rapid translation.

Deadline Dates: Applications may be submitted on or after February 23, 2018. The deadline for receipt of optional letters of intent is 30 days prior to the application due date. The deadlines for receipt of full applications are: March 27, 2018; February 20, 2019; and February 20, 2020, by 5:00 PM local time of applicant organization. This FOA will expire on February 21, 2020. For more details, visit: https://grants.nih.gov/grants/guide/pa-files/PAR-18-585.html
